a good indicator of whether someone is telling a lie
a visiting professor of psychology at Brandeis University
polygraphs , which attempt to determine someone 's honesty by their physiological response to certain questions
firms that do sensitive work for agencies like the CIA and FBI
firms that do sensitive work for agencies like the CIA and FBI , companies that provide security services and those that make or distribute controlled substances
